alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 2:28PM MST until February 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible in the mountains. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible with isolated higher amounts near mountain peaks. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mt Graham, and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From Wednesday mid morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and significantly reduced visibility in any blowing snow. Bursts of heavy snow may make travel very difficult at best.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may seriously impact travel. Gusty winds and blowing snow is also possible. Those planning travel into the watch area should prepare for difficult winter driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
